title: Bond Traders’ Big Bet for 2026 Vindicated by Soft US Job Growth
description: Bond investors’ overarching wager on the path of the Federal Reserve and the Treasuries market in 2026 looks like it has room to run.
content: Bond investors’ overarching wager on the path of the Federal Reserve and the Treasuries market in 2026 looks like it has room to run.
